AI Description: svtools is a collection of tools for detecting and genotyping structural variants (SVs) in genome sequencing data. It processes and analyzes diverse types of structural variants, including deletions, duplications, inversions, and translocations.
Core Features: Detection Of Structural Variants In Genome Sequencing Data, Genotyping Of Structural Variants, Analysis Of Deletions, Duplications, Inversions, & Translocations
General Tags: Structural Variant Detection, Genome Sequencing, Bioinformatics
